instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165-A MagSafe light, fan spin, no image, no water damage
threads.message:
L3095 0V
L7520 5.13V
L7701 0V
L7560 3.36V
L7310 pin 1 - 1.97V pin 2 - 1.8V
L7320 pin 1 - 1.99V pin 2 - 1.8V
L7130  pin 1 pulsating 5.90V - 7.2V pin 2 8.6V

PPBUS_G3H is 8.6V and 3V42 is present 3.42V.
PM_BATLOW_L - 3.31V
PM_DSW_PWRGD. - 3.42V
PM_RSMRST_L - 3.03V
PM_PWRBTN_L - 1.0V
PM_SLP_SUS_L - 3.34V

someone knows how to proceed?

threads.title: 820-00165-A MagSafe light, fan spin, no image, no water damage
threads.message:
"PM_PWRBTN_L - 1.0V"
Are you really sure?

Do you get USB activity, or external video?

BTW, stop to check voltage on both pins of a coil.
You can find the output DC voltage on the pin connected to filter capacitor.

threads.title: 820-00165-A MagSafe light, fan spin, no image, no water damage
threads.message:
PM_PWRBTN_L - 3.41V sorry.

I have USB activity, but not external video.

threads.title: 820-00165-A MagSafe light, fan spin, no image, no water damage
threads.message:
Did you try known good compatible LCD assembly?

Check if in the first seconds you get 3V at pins L8304; also check if coil is good.
You must get this voltage even without LCD, but will only stay present 2-5s.
If LCD is connected, DP_INT_HPD must go high at same time.

threads.title: 820-00165-A MagSafe light, fan spin, no image, no water damage
threads.message:
L8304 we get 0V all the time!
Sorry, I copy/paste the subscription, and this board was water damage.
I already replaced all the bad components near U5000, U1900. And washed into ultrasonic machine.
R7180 pin 1 missing. made a bridge between C7184 pin 1 and R7180 pin 1

threads.title: 820-00165-A MagSafe light, fan spin, no image, no water damage
threads.message: Corrosion near SMC requires to reball it...
